app.name: HH Applicant Tool
app.one_liner: A Python CLI tool for automating job application actions on HH.RU, including applying to suitable vacancies, updating resumes, generating cover letters with ChatGPT, and messaging employers.

screens.name: Main Dashboard
screens.purpose: Display current automation status, recent activity, and quick actions for managing job applications.

rust_commands.name: apply_to_vacancies
rust_commands.purpose: Automatically apply to suitable vacancies using configured resume and generated cover letter.

rust_commands.name: send_employer_messages
rust_commands.purpose: Send pre-configured messages to employer chats after applying to increase visibility.

rust_commands.name: update_all_resumes
rust_commands.purpose: Refresh all user resumes on HH.RU to maintain visibility in search results.

mvp_plan: week 1: Implement core vacancy scanning and application logic
week 1: Integrate ChatGPT for cover letter generation
acceptance_tests: Tool successfully applies to a test vacancy with a generated cover letter.
All user resumes are updated within the configured time window.
Messages are sent to employer chats after application without errors.
